attributes.action: purple group key stage 4 Sandside Lodge School Ulverston Cumbria
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are tired of the dog mess around our school and in the community, are you? Lets do something about it.
We as a group have taken this issue to the Town Council.                    We want more dog bins with bags attatched to them. 
More wardens.
More posters. 
One example we thought of is naming and shaming people and embarrass people.

rejection.details: Your title should be a request for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
